website_summaries.verdict: Resin wicker cooler can withstand all the elements.
pros: Part of a coordinating set of chairs and tables, this cooler has a large 77-quart capacity
It comes with some useful bells and whistles, too – a towel rack and wire basket for accessories and an enclosed bottom shelf
Drain tube goes from the center of the inside
cons: The snap-together assembly is tricky – once locked, you can't get it apart again, so there’s no wiggle room for mistakes

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Blue ice w/ crushed ice, stays cool for days in 80 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: I rolled this a couple of times throughout our party, "trying" to keep it in the shade. I used "Large Blue Ice Bricks" to line bottom and a couple on the side. Added drinks and large bag of ice; Party started Saturday 3pm, today is Monday 7:30pm, and it's still frozen! There's a large 2" thick layer of ice and the bricks are still cool. Pretty remarkable with 80 degree weather here in sunny Cal. I also use this as a "table" to set cool plates on when I'm grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth a $0.01. The wire cage rusted and fell apart within 5 days. That's right people 5 days. How the heck was this product tested and approved for retail. This is a waste of money. I did buy the matching garbage bins and they work great, but this product must have been an after thought and cheap quality. I wish this thing was easily returned as I would like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Techie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler; hang on to the styrofoam included as it is for the insulation.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Very cute and blends nicely with my patio furniture. I have read many reviews stating that it is not insulated or that they added Styrofoam; there is Styrofoam included with a big red sticker indicating that the Styrofoam is for the cooler and to not discard, perhaps not everybody read this. The directions were not super clear but pretty easy to figure out, although it is very difficult to disassemble one snapped into place.
customer_reviews.author: T-Wood class of 91

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: This might have looked ok but we were never able to finish putting it together. Although it was packed well and shipped with no visible damage, 2 of the larger pieces were dented so the cooler wouldn’t fit together properly. Amazon was fine about allowing us to return it for a refund. I do think it was a little flimsy so maybe it’s for the best that we had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Never buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from Amazon for years now and this is the first time I've had a problem and i am not upset with Amazon!! I received my product in the mail today made by Suncast. It was scratched up and has a few holes in the side and it bent on the side!! It looks like somebody just threw this in the Box! I'm just letting you know before I give you one star for the rating and pictures to prove it I'm not asking to return it but I would never order another product from Suncast again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Literally impossible to put together. There a logical error in the design-after 2 hours I gave up. Cannot be done. I called the Help Line-no answer. I’m returning. Thanks for wasting my weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why There are complaints about assembly. This took me 15 minutes to put together. It was so easy. No tools required, all you have to do is follow the directions. Don't throw anything out until you have completely followed all of the directions and assembled the unit. Styrofoam is included for the insulation. I haven't used it yet but it looks lovely on my patio and I can't wait to fill it with ice and drinks this Sunday on Father's Day to test it out. I'll update my review if there are any problems but otherwise it's a great little piece for entertainment and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: RebFly

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my parents who love to entertain outdoors during the summer. They loved the look and size of it and they can’t wait for warmer weather to arrive so they can show it off to their friends. It was relatively easy to assemble alone. While it appears sturdy I’m very interested to see how it holds up this summer season.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Nice Patio Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hostess helper to use on the patio or indoors. I really like the drainage tube so you don't have to scope the unused ice/water out after use. It's important to air the bin out before closing it up.
customer_reviews.author: occnur

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Expected more based on the reviews. Missing an entire piece and almost the entire cooler was chipping or had pieces of plastic that weren't trimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Keep the styrofoam, if it comes with it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but ice melts quick, I have ordered a styrofoam cooler ($20), from Walmart to line the inside, all the reviews I have read said it came with styrofoam, I’m thinking my husband threw it out, thinking it was trash and that could be why the ice melts so quickly🤦🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: flimsy plastic, snaps together, longevity not promising, seems overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For the price, seems flimsy and doesnt feel like it will last long. Time will tell. Pieces only snap together and doesnt feel sturdy enough for the long haul. Overpriced for the quality. The wheels roll nicely though. If I had paid $50 for it, I'd say its fair.
customer_reviews.author: R B Miller

customer_reviews.title: of the plastic parts is not good, most pieces do not fit together like they ...
customer_reviews.text: SEVERAL parts were missing therefore I could not assemble it completely. The bottom door (on the front) was not in the box, the top door (on the front) did not fit right. The lid does not close / fit well. Bottom-line, the mfg. of the plastic parts is not good, most pieces do not fit together like they should. I have ordered and assembled MANY, many items before but this particular product was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cooler works great, we had a party on the 4th
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with several other Suncast items to keep my deck and patio looking tidy this summer. This one was definitely the trickiest one to assemble, but even so it was really not difficult as long as you're careful about lining up all the parts before popping the sides together. The cooler works great, we had a party on the 4th, it was blazing hot and sunny all weekend, and there was still ice in there over 24 hours later!
customer_reviews.author: H. Mueller-Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Good but slight inconveniences
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, 2 issues didn’t come with instruction but easy enough to find on line. But the hinges the pin come loose and slides out. I super glued the out side of each one in place and has worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Not there best quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I’m really disappointed in this one! The whole thing doesn’t even snap. It’s uneven and just made poorly I have all suncast products this one was a waste of money and time. I threw the box away or I would have sent it back. Don’t buy this cooler it’s cheap and looks it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments on this cooler, it's so stylish and blends in nicely on our patio. I like the storage compartment below and the basket (we put cups in it) and paper towel holder, so functional. It keeps drinks pretty cold, although not quite as cold as some of our other traditional coolers (the ice melts faster in this than others). However, given the style and function of it, I'd still recommend it. I also really like that it's on wheels, which makes it so much easier to move than typical coolers once they're full.
customer_reviews.author: DrJacVick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my patio. It matches my furniture, tucks away easily in the corner when not in use and the wheels make it easy to move around when guests come. The lower compartment is a great for storage (I keep plates, utensils, etc. in it) and the cooler compartment is large. There is a drain so cleanup is easy when done.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This cooler is smart.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was intelligent...make sure you follow the drawings, meticulously follow or you will be disassembling things designed to snap once. Once assembled, you realize how intelligent this design is. The unit is superb, performance is yet-like, without the cost. Utilitarian with paper to we el holder and wire basket for whatever. Once together, it's a solid piece of furniture for anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tuna Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was easy as long as you realize that each piece is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this. Set-up was easy as long as you realize that each piece is marked with a letter for set-up. My only disappointment is that the lid does not snap shut as it is supposed to. I had to improvise and do a small work around, however this should not have been a problem - it should be made to close properly. Outside of that, the quality is very good!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best buys I've had this summer. The cooler came quick and the assembly was very simple, everything just snaps together. It looks great and holds a LOT! On my first day using it, I grabbed two 10 lb bags of ice and some beers/waters, I dumped the first bag in and it barely covered the bottom of the cooler, after I added the drinks and then the other bash and realized this cooler was made to hold 40lbs of ice if needed. I love it, the wheels make it convenient and so does the lower storage. Great purchase for me, works great, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: good design elements. Great size.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think I got alot. The top holds 4 large bags of ice and enough never erase to last all night at a party. The bottom cupboard holds 3 6 packs of bottles of beer and two twelve packs of cans of soda. The paper towel dipensor and cup holder basket were nice perks as well. A must have for people who like have backyard bbqs. The wheels are high qualily, make rolling around very simple, even over the door thresholds.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Faith

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, insulation leaves a lot to be desired!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and functionality this cooler. It holds up to 72 cans, and since it's wheeled it can be moved easily when it's fully loaded. Great for the day of an event...beyond that it is not insulated enough for long term (HAHAA, like 2 days) storage. Ice melts VERY quickly in warm weather even when stored in the shade. Looks great, we bought this to match our deck storage box...but for the money I wish I'd spent a little bit more and got something more insulated. Why have a cooler that holds 72 cans if you can't keep them cold long term!
customer_reviews.author: LesaT

customer_reviews.title: You need 3 or 4 to assemble (if you can at all)
customer_reviews.text: This is impossible to put together. I finally got to the last side and 2 people working together have been unable to assemble this. It has to line up in so many places at the same time it ridiculous. The sides are not sturdy enough to have maintained a flat shape. They are warped and what's at the root of the problem. And it's impossible to disassemble to return. Honestly never been so frustrated. Save your sanity. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mscoachdebby

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It does everything I need it to do, and it matches my outdoor furniture. One problem though, make sure you have 2 people to put the cooler together. I had no one, and when the door was supposed to attach to the sides, the door slipped, and everything locked together, minus the door. Once locked, you can't get it apart again. There are no screws involved at all..
customer_reviews.author: Vera Ellen Killman

customer_reviews.title: Completes Suncast Set
customer_reviews.text: Replacing earlier review about horrible assembly instructions because I had overlooked the door A which was hidden behind another piece. Got it put together and it is pretty easy. Just as others advised TAKE THE TIME to read the instructions first and look at the illustrations before snapping anything in place. It's another nice piece to my Suncast collection. It is well built.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: This thing was a nightmare to assemble. The pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a nightmare to assemble. The pieces did not fit together as they were shipped, and after spending an hour trying to [figuratively] jam a square plug in a round hole, I got out my handsaw and had to break pieces so that they'd fit. When I did finally finish it off, however, it got many compliments from friends at my BBQ. If you have more patience than I, perhaps it's for you.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Father’s Day!
customer_reviews.text: Just got put together- lots of room on inside. Make sure you save styrofoam in packaging for insulation of cooler. This will be used a lot this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Myers

customer_reviews.title: This product is a piece of crap. The pieces don't align perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of crap. The pieces don't align perfectly. It didn't snap in right and we were unable to get it back apart to fix it. My husband about started attacking it with his hammer. So we decided to return it. But of course it didn't fit back in the box it came in and remember we couldn't get it apart no matter how hard we tried. We purchased a large enough box to fit back in to return and because Amazon is amazing, they gave us a credit on our account for the price of the box. 5 stars for Amazon customer service, 1 star, not even, for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K

customer_reviews.title: great and after 2 years in the backyard
customer_reviews.text: great and after 2 years in the backyard, withstanding wind, weather and snow everything stays dry inside and the color did not fade
customer_reviews.author: PeJoRa

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for People Who Enjoy Hosting
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I got this for our parents for their anniversary and they absolutely loved it! They host a lot of parties in their backyard and it was a perfect addition to the rest of their wicker furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cooler. I went to Lowes and bought a sheet of Styrofoam insulation and cut it to fit so I would have another layer of insulation other than what came with it, I also glued 2 layers on the inside of the lid, one the 3rd day, it still had some ice in it.
customer_reviews.author: pennyg

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: As a cooler, this is mostly worthless. Looks nice but ice melts really really quickly. Had a regular cooler next to this one for a party and the other cooler still had ice 2 days later. Way too much money for basically, nothing. Oh, and it was quite difficult to put together. Pieces were bending.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Kasser

customer_reviews.title: Glad we got this!
customer_reviews.text: The only "con" with this item, is that the lid is not insulated, but fortunately, my husband is quite handy and used some styrofoam we had laying around and cut it to fit the inside of the lid. Now, it's perfect. Looks great, easy to move around and is quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: ygguzman

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS AND NO RESPONSE
customer_reviews.text: My cooler arrived yesterday but did not include the middle shelf or the plastic hinge pins. Unable to get a response on how to get these!! I can't use the cooler without the shelf, as it will not even stand without it. It was also missing the pins that hold the top lid in place so it wont stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy to put together, strong, and very very cool. Love this thing, no more bending over to grab a drink from a regular cooler. And did i mentioned it is strong! No wobble, it feels very sturdy. The only thing i would change is the towel rack on the side, is a little flimsy, is ok for a towel, but because it looks like a handle on the side of it, people tend to grab it to move the cooler around, and it is not strong enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: carlos osle

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's Day gift for my husband. I was able to put it together by myself within 20 minutes. It was easy and i love it! I haven't actually tried it out yet, so i will write another review once we do. As for now i love the look of it and I cannot wait to give it to him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I usually try to wait a few months after use to leave a review, but I was really impressed with this piece! It's perfect! It's clear there's no real insulation, but aesthetics and additional functionality makes up for that! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Dee 40 STL

customer_reviews.title: Quality was not that good. Instructions could be better
customer_reviews.text: Quality was not that good. Instructions could be better. We had all the pieces, but after starting assembly, realized we got someone else's return. Started to take apart, but decided we could hide the blemishes, since taking apart would probably cause more damage. 1 for 2 on suncast products, will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Nice for by the pool.
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments on this cooler. It is huge and the shelf is so convenient. The plastic 'cable' that holds the lid open (seen in the photo on the back left) does not stay straight and gets in the way of closing the lid at times. Also, the pins holding the lid on come out a little bit each time you open/close the lid. Every so often someone needs to push the pins back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our hot tub/patio area
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something that we could grab a drink from without having to exit the hot tub. This roller cooler works great. It has a huge capacity (not sure we will ever need all that space unless we have a large party). The wheels have a lock, which is a nice feature. The bottom cupboard is handy. I use it to store my hot tub chemicals and accessories. This roller cooler works great for our multiple needs within the patio and hot tub area. And it looks good, matching well with other decor.
customer_reviews.author: RedHolly

customer_reviews.title: It drains easily and I love the basket and towel holder on ...
customer_reviews.text: We were a little hesitant about this cooler. When it arrived we almost sent it back. The directions for assembly weren't completely clear but we did figure it out and now....can't imagine being with out it. It does keep our drinks cold and we are in the 90-100 degree mark during the summer. It drains easily and I love the basket and towel holder on the sides. The storage compartment underneath is perfect. I would warn you about overloading it. We used a block of ice and a couple of bags of ice with the drinks and it was too much. The cooler started popping apart!!! Best just to add more ice as needed.
customer_reviews.author: BBSTS

customer_reviews.title: was the best decorative ice cooler I have ever had I love ...
customer_reviews.text: was the best decorative ice cooler I have ever had I love it! it kept the drinks ice cold for hours and was easy to drain afterwards the design and color matched the wicker patio furniture so I highly recommend this item! also locks into place so that it doesn't roll easy to wipe down easy to put together and if parts needed there is a list and number available to you
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my deck.
customer_reviews.text: I've just used this once so far, but I like it. It was easy to fill & easy to drain & my man-cave buddies were impressed. I learned from previously assembling a Suncast wastebasket to read & follow the directions closely so assembly went well. I did not rush it, but carefully matched parts and pictures in the correct order and didn't have any trouble, as some other reviewers reported.
customer_reviews.author: kc1tom

customer_reviews.title: I am returning this item and am highly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about buying this for my dad's birthday. After opening up the box and pulling all the pieces out to get ready to put the item together we noticed that the plastic on the outside body of the cooler was scratched up and parts of the plastic looked dented/warped in several places on multiple pieces. I am returning this item and am highly disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Hall

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking, sturdy with large cooler department. I keep bottled water, beer, you name it, plus it's stayed cold for  3-
customer_reviews.text: Love this, we actually removed our outdoor small fridge because this cooler keeps drinks cold for days. Easy to empty, nice attached paper towel rack with another basket on the other side for cup storage. .
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really keep the ice from melting on super hot days like we get here in south Texas
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really keep the ice from melting on super hot days like we get here in south Texas, so I pretty much use it as storage for my outdoor cooking tools now. Does keep them dry and dust free. Also store my bags of charcoal in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Saunders

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE
customer_reviews.text: USED ONCE BUT I DONT KONW IF ITS GOING TO HOLD UP, NOT VERY STRONG
customer_reviews.author: nate brunson

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for your patio!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. It has a tube for drainage of melted ice. The liner is very thick and I expect will last for quite some time. I am looking forward to using it on the patio this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily until I made the mistake of snapping one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily until I made the mistake of snapping one of the pieces together without the side completely lined up. Make sure you check it as you go!! Called company for help and received directions via email on how to disassemble so I could put it together correctly. Looks great and is compact. Like that it is higher off ground and provides lots of space for plenty of drinks. Great value for money. Only complaint is ice melted faster than traditional cooler but was sitting out all day. Overall love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: My helper
customer_reviews.text: Best way to keep everything in one place, storage and cooler . I had the event all outside ,no running back and fourth to refill the beverages . I stocked it up and when it looked empty bring some up from underneath and done. Two of my friends decided they had to have one , I think that speaks for it self
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Villar

customer_reviews.title: it is easy, I was having a tough day
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So the assembly was a bit tough, although, it is easy, I was having a tough day. nonetheless: used it on Thanksgiving day. it had ice and freezing water in it on SUNDAY. yes, that is over 3 days. this thing is nuts. very good looking also. I never had a cooler like this. don't hesitate if you are thinking about. get it to your yard and use it.
customer_reviews.author: mmf

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This was quite difficult to get together. In the beginning, the fault was my own, as I had the "bottom" upside down. Once I got that figured out (through a phone call to the company), I thought it would be easy breezy. Once I got to "L", I had another problem getting it to fit. I finally got it, but I now have a crack. Hopefully the small crack won't end up being a problem, as it's not located near the cooling part. I do have a question - is the lid supposed to snap closed or just rest in a closed position? If this cools as well as I hope, I will be increasing the stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: this product would never get any recommendation from me. It came damaged from the mfg, the side had scratches on it. And it was over $100.00 dollars. Never again
customer_reviews.author: pat dabrowski

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. It is very spacious and pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bag over Styrofoam
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a plastic bag inside over Styrofoam sides it’s so cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Only took about 45 minutes to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Only took about 45 minutes to put together. Great for our deck. I’m glad I purchased it! Suncast really makes some quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ratmith

customer_reviews.title: Resin Wicker look Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This was much nicer than what I expected. It held ice for over 24 hours and kept the melted ice for 48 hours. Some good features with a place for paper towels and a holder for glasses or whatever you want to put there. 1) the packaging was good and well packed, instructions were good also. 2) Yes I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Glorybee

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with these ice coolers
customer_reviews.text: I'm the Director of Plant operations for a skilled nursing Community, I was looking for a replacement of our old traditional two panel Ice Cooler on a cart, when I saw this Ice Cooler by Suncast. I immediately liked the wicker look and that these are up right which make it easier for the nurses to get ice. I ordered three and they were a hit here at our community and last week I placed an order for two more. Jesse C. Rodriguez The Victoria Care Center Ventura CA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: using it for a while, a couple of brown spots on liner but still good condition
customer_reviews.author: Effie M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke pieces... no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you open the box and look for broken pieces as soon as it's delivered. I did not and piece was broke and it was pass due to be able to return it. Also, the cooler did not come with assembly instructions and I cold not figure it out. Hopefully I can contact Amazon and still be able to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A bit dissatisfied with cooler area
customer_reviews.text: The inside is a soft plastic and not a durable material. Everything else is nice but will not last long due to material.
customer_reviews.author: brenda delvalle

customer_reviews.title: Nice to serve cold drinks! Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Buy a block of ice to keep things cold and a bag of crushef ice to put in drinks! Last about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: chillin' with the storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a welcome addition next to the deck and grill area! Bottom door for grill accessories and it is water tight! Top cooler--we have not used yet but will be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. Like the extra features of a storage drawer in the bottom, the paper towel rack on the side, and the rack on the other side. the cooler is insulated by thin Styrofoam panels, but if the day is hot, can probably add more Styrofoam to add in the insulation - so far it has been good and kept things cool, but there is flexibility to add more insulation.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Very functional. Offers extra space to hold drink mixes, glasses, spices whatever you may need
customer_reviews.author: D. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Perfectly matches Suncast wicker garbage can. Easy to put together, NO tools needed and just snaps together. Some reviews state that instructions were difficult, maybe they've been updated because they were pretty straight forward and clear. All in all great value for the price and does not take up and Room because it's stands upright compare to other coolers. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Outdoor Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looking forward to using it soon. It truly is elegant piece of outdoor furniture to add to my new patio and pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: NICE COOLER
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE IT ! The drain hose needs to be a little longer
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things super cold and is handy to have near the pool
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things super cold and is handy to have near the pool. The storage space on the bottom is convenient for bug spray and sun screen. Only thing i dont like is that the plug inside the cooler will not stay closed. Its nice that the cooler can be drained but i dont want to lose all the cold water until i want to drain it. I clamped the drain hose closed to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It holds a lot of beverages, plus is very nice looking addition to our patio. Easy to assemble and use. Has rollers to move about that lock. Saw the same item at Lowes for $129, so this is a great savings.
customer_reviews.author: Barbjo

customer_reviews.title: We love this- stays outside at the pool and holds ice ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this- stays outside at the pool and holds ice for 2 days ! Keeps us from having to go back and forth from the house to the pool for beverages- love the drain - it was a pistol to put together though !
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought new furniture for my back yard and figured to add a better looking cooler and I love it! The quality is great. Easy to put together and the color matched my furniture to perfection! I recently had a party and the cooler was a topic of conversation many times.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Cold drinks1
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought one for my sister & she loved it as well!
customer_reviews.author: angela deynes

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage cart!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in about 20 minutes. Its perfect for our patio and holds a ton of cans...we had 4 cases of cans in there this weekend and there was plenty of space for more and it kept everything cold for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: cooler for the summer
customer_reviews.text: This matches our patio set perfect ! Easy to put together like all the little extras on it. Towel rack,holder on side, little storage area on bottom. Haven't used it yet waiting for our summer get togethers. If it keeps products cold like it states I"ll be writing another review. Happy customer so far ................................
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: ... to put together and my husband and I are better than average when it come to putting stuff together
customer_reviews.text: This was such a pain to put together and my husband and I are better than average when it come to putting stuff together. However, when all was said and done, it is very nice looking and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Linds2113

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler, exactly as described. The large size of the cooler compartment allows for 2 liters or bottles of wine/champagne in addition to bottles of beer. The drain tube is great to drain off excess water during a party. Under storage shelf is useful. Assembly was a little tricky and easier with two people.
customer_reviews.author: MCV

customer_reviews.title: great cooler. I live in florida and yesterday the ...
customer_reviews.text: great cooler. I live in florida and yesterday the temps were about 90. This thing sat half in the sun half not and there was still ice in it when i left for work at 2 pm today. There are Styrofoam insulators in the box that need to be added to the cooler portion to help insulate it. Other than that this cooler looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reed

customer_reviews.title: Hope the packaging was better to protect the parts from dinging and scratching
customer_reviews.text: Giving this purchase 4 stars since the first one that was delivered to us was all scratched up. Hope the packaging was better to protect the parts from dinging and scratching. Other than that, were happy with the wicker. Easy to install and keeps our drinks cold for a long time. Looks pretty good too!
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our Florida Porch. Easy to install and since it's all plastic weather proof it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: El Malo

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice ,holds alot of drinks
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cooler .Holds alot of drinks. We use it as a mini bar
customer_reviews.author: David Gramzow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable, Stylish Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Matches our wicker lounge set perfectly. I had another Suncast cooler in another color that lasted for years. That’s why I bought another!
customer_reviews.author: P. Ser

customer_reviews.title: Wicker cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to our patio set. I really like it, but you have to assemble, so be ready for that. I haven't had any issues with it and gotten compliments on its appearance as it doesn't even look like a cooler and more like a furniture piece. Pleased with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase and would recommend purchasing it. My husband said it was fairly simple to put together. The directions weren't that great, but he figured it out. Very sturdy and the little cabinet on the bottom comes in handy. It keeps beverages cold and when you are done using it, it has a drain.
customer_reviews.author: TLove

customer_reviews.title: It does not keep drinks cold for long ice melts quickly
customer_reviews.text: The product has a lot of space and looks great but it does not keep the items cold, the ice melts very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Completely happy with it and the whole transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: great little storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep our towels and hot tub chemicals dry. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your patio / entertaining space!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and perfect for a patio (or even indoors). The height is good and the cooler functions really well. Keeps drinks cold for longer than expected!
customer_reviews.author: ErikGoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this!! It looks cute, don't get me wrong. But the box was beat up when it arrived and missing several pieces. There are no hinge pins so I have to lift the lid completely off when I want to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaura

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cooler and storage
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I expected. It has weathered perfectly, no color fading, cracking, etc. easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I have this ice chest and love it so much that I bought it for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this ice chest and love it so much that I bought it for my dad. It's great quality. It sits in the sun all day and hasn't faded after 2 years. It's easy to clean and moves easily on wheels. Great for the price, and there's a matching trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Matches our set perfectly and is useful for BBQs/ Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Matches our set perfectly and is useful for BBQs/ Entertaining. The workmanship leaves something to be desired. There were so many sharp plastic pieces jetting from poor plastic forming. We cut/sanded them off but that leaves a maker on the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ali O

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Server.
customer_reviews.text: Added this product to our patio it has been great. Stores ice for up to three days, bottom hose drains perfectly, holds a variety of drinks, stores extras in the bottom and is a very attractive addition to our patio! Even my husband could assemble with a smile which automatically qualifies it for five stars!
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star, however this was not easy to put together. I still have an issue after returning the first one the 2nd one was not as bad, however it was not made correctly or positioned correctly to seal the back area of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: Cool for the deck.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little tedious. Foam insulation seemed inadequate to keep things cold, but will have to wait until summer to see how it holds up. Otherwise it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Bleu

customer_reviews.title: great addition to the patio
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler! It was actually pretty easy and straight forward to assemble. Not sure why other reviewers were having issues assembling this. The cooler looks really nice and functions well. Keeps drinks cold for more than enough time. This thing holds a lot of ice and cans or bottles! The first time I used it I got 3 bags of ice and that barely put a dent in it. I really like the side rack and extra storage underneath. Absolutely recommend this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Sven Hoek

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous (looking) & Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday and it's been a hit at all our outdoor parties. It's so cute and matches the decor perfectly that people don't realize it's a functioning cooler at times. We love the paper towel holder and side basket for various extra entertaining items. Overall it was a great purchase. Holds lots of drinks and ice.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBurn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I ordered this as a gift and it has scratches all over it? This is obviously not new!
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Puzzle pieces that don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is next to impossible. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

product_meta.title: Suncast Resin Wicker Outdoor Cooler with Wheels - Portable Outdoor Bar Cart to Store Ice, Drinks, and Frozen Treats - Store on Deck or Patio - Java
product_meta.description: Keep beverages ice cold on your deck, patio, or porch this summer with the Suncast 77-Quart Cooler Station Patio Cooler. This essential entertaining station features a decorative design that complements any environment and comes complete with a side basket, great for storing cups and other necessary supplies. Extendable leaf attachment adds counter space, perfect for hosting gatherings such as an outdoor bbq. Convenient hinged lid opens easily for waist-high access to drinks and treats. Plus, the cabinet space below is ideal for utensils and other supplies. This spacious cooler cart holds 77 quarts, 72 cans, or 6 2-liter bottles. Transporting this cooler is beyond easy as there are 2 locking and 2 non-locking wheels for hassle-free portability. Constructed with a durable resin construction this Cooler Station by Suncast is the perfect choice for year-round use.
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR COOLER: Portable decorative plastic cooler with a drop leaf extension that is perfect for entertaining on your patio, deck, or in your backyard!
DURABLE: Made of resin which provide years of quality year-round outdoor use
VERSATILE: Keep drinks and frozen treats cold in the cooler while storing extras supplies in the cabinet below and side basket. Leaf extension adds prep area to your cooler
FUNCTIONAL LID: A hinged lid open waist-high to provide easy access to beverages and snacks
IDEAL SIZE: Cooler measures 25.5" W (exclusing leaf and basket) x 22" D x 34" H, the perfect size for your outdoor space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars621 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
